returns.claimPool: Amount in the claim reserve pool
returns.yieldPool: Amount in the yield generation pool

returns.liquidityRatio: Ratio of liquid assets to short-term liabilities
returns.reserveRatio: Ratio of claim reserves to total policy coverage
returns.solvencyRatio: Ratio of total assets to total liabilities
